data.text:
Aldau beach hotel is incredible good hotel resort. Everything is so clean and well thought through. Gastronomie is overall in very high level. Tang Beach restaurant and great service from Sara Ibrahim enrich the wonderful experience. You get nice drinks from reception bar or at the pool bar. 

I would like to also mention the Boulevard front of the hotel and the beautiful stores on it. You find there nice jeweleries, parfumes, nature product from Narjes, high quality cotton products from Cottonil. Oh yeah there are super cool bags and shoes visa-a-visa from Eqypt air duty free close to Carrefour.

Big thumbs up from Switzerland.
data.title: Steigenberger Aldau beach hotel rocks!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear DayTrip,
Thank you very much for your nice reply after your stay at our Steigenberger ALDAU Beach Hotel.
 We are pleased to hear that we could exceed your expectations and that you liked our hotel. 
We will pass on your compliments to our staff, which is the best motivation we can offer! May we thank you for taking the time to post these comments. An exceptional holiday experience for all of our guests is what we expect from our hotel and all feedback is vital to our constant efforts to improve our service.
 Guest satisfaction is our number one goal and there is nothing better than achieving that! 
The Steigenberger ALDAU Beach Hotel team is looking forward to welcoming you again and hopes to meet your expectation once again. 
With best regards, 
Steigenberger ALDAU Beach management team
owner_response.author: Guest Service manager

data.text: Great family vacation with lovely ambiance. Good food. Great kids club (special thanks for Randa). Very nice reception welcoming for our friend youssef talat. We Will frequently come to this warm place in hurghada. Don't miss it up. Welcome to egypt.
data.title: Great family vacation

data.text:
We had a fantastic trip. The food, service and hotel was incredible. We really enjoyed the buffet and there is a large variety of restaurants also available. The beach is beautiful and both the beach and pool have good options for shade or sun. The kids club was good, we stayed with our son because of his age, and really enjoyed the different activities on offer and kids disco in the evening. 

The only thing we would say the hotel could improve with is having their own hairdressers/ beauty salon. The company (Raa spa)  the hotel partners with unfortunately was the only negative of our trip after watching some people charged 300 euros more than us for the same treatment and a terrible treatment. The spa was not clean, treatment rooms were not private, the same towels were used for the facial as another person and nail tools were not sterilised between people. When I shared feedback after them asking me for a review I was told I was correct and guided to the door. I would advise anyone staying to steer clear of this place and head into Hurghada for a better deal and service. This was the only negative during our stay and while I do appreciate it’s another company that just advertises by the restaurant of the hotel, we trusted them having a desk within the hotel would mean a certain level of service. We did also share this feedback with the guest relations team and they said they would follow up, I hope they did after we left.
data.title: A Fantastic Family Break

data.text:
Never been in an hotel with such a excelent customer service. Everyone is there to please you from the bartender at the beach to restaurant staff till the reception.
The hotel is very good and i will point out points:
Very positive: customer service -looks like there is a lot of training and people is always with a smile in their faces, extreme cleaning from the rooms to surrounds(gardens, swimming-pools, beach), entertainment in the evening and active activities during the day, snacks and drinks in midle morning and in the afternoon, even freezing wet towels at lunch time to refresh youself before lunch. There is a special salted water heated swimming pool.
Positive but could be better: in the buffet at the main restaurant i would aprecciate having more choice of veal meat, as a matter a fact it was a little repetitive.
Beach is very clean and organized, but the sea level is most of the time down so is like a swimming-pool for kids.
I would definetely return to this hotel focused in the satisfaction of the customer.
data.title: Wonderfull holidays

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest 

Thank you for taking the time to share your experience on TripAdvisor.

The entire team is pleased that you had such a fantastic holiday with us!

Your praise is indeed our greatest motivation and we are pleased to read that our team has done everything to make your stay as successful as it should be.

Our entire team is already missing you and waiting for to welcome you again and to say "Welcome home".

With kind regards
Steigenberger ALDAU Team
owner_response.author: Guest Service manager

data.text:
Excellent Egyptian Hotel  ⭐️ ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Beautiful gardens - Amazing pool and lazy river - Great staff and service - Nice food and opportunity to eat in different restaurants - Relaxing and hassle free - Great cocktails - Book with confidence and enjoy.
data.title: Lovely luxury Hotel
